name: With It Or On It
description:
With it or on it. There is no middle ground. You can be the last Spartan resisting Persian invasion of Thermopylae. You will die today, but you will take as many enemies with you as you can.

How to play?

Stab, hit, slam and bash your enemies. You will become stronger after each received hit. Every spilled drop of your blood makes you more furious and increases your combat abilities. Use this adventage to decimate your enemies.

Controls AMove leftDMove rightW or SpacebarJumpMouse left clickAttack Music

Artist: Benjamin Tissot: https://www.bensound.com

Title: Instinct: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/instinct
